titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Evan Jervis, Acting Paymaster, to the Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: In the letter Jervis states that he has been advised that cash to pay the troops and cruizers stationed at Ra's al-Khaymah will need to be raised in the Persian Gulf. Jervis asks whether this is possible, and also requests information on the exchange rates of rupees against Spanish dollars, and German and Venetian crowns. Jervis states that 100,000 rupees will be required.
